 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּשָׂה‎</span><sub>21</sub> **verb** ==spread==, intransitive (Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּסָה‎</span> ***id.***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (<img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">) ***be divulged, spread, be extensive***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פ‎</span> [[Lev.13.5|Lev 13:5]] +, 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָֽשְׂתָה‎</span> v[[Lev.13.8|Lev 13:8]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּשָׂ֑תָה‎</span> v[[Lev.13.23|Lev 13:23]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִפְשֶׂה‎</span> v[[Lev.13.35|Lev 13:35]], 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תּפְשֶׂה‎</span> v[[Lev.13.7|Lev 13:7]] +; ***infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּשׂה‎</span> v[[Lev.13.7|Lev 13:7]] +; — only [[Lev.13|Lev 13]]; [[Lev.14|Lev 14]], of leprosy and like eruptions: with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּעוֺר‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּבֶּגֶּד‎</span>, etc., [[Lev.13.5|Lev 13:5]] + 7 t. 13, [[Lev.14.39|Lev 14:39]]; [[Lev.14.44|Lev 14:44]]; [[Lev.14.48|Lev 14:48]] + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎) בָּעוֺר‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּשׂה יִפְשֶׂה(תִּפ‎</span> [[Lev.13.7|Lev 13:7]]; [[Lev.13.22|Lev 13:22]]; [[Lev.13.27|Lev 13:27]]; [[Lev.13.35|Lev 13:35]] absolute v[[Lev.13.23|Lev 13:23]]; [[Lev.13.32|Lev 13:32]]; [[Lev.13.55|Lev 13:55]].
